name: Astebreed

files.humbleinstaller: N/A:Please select the Humble Bundle installer.

content:
files:
- humbleinstaller: N/A:Please select the Humble Bundle installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Astebreed/Astebreed.exe
  humbleid: astebreed
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    description: Installing Astebreed
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Astebreed/
    file: humbleinstaller
